channel.title: About on Jakarta EE: The New Home of Cloud Native Java
channel.description: Recent content in About on Jakarta EE: The New Home of Cloud Native Java

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: Q: What are we announcing on April 24? A: The key elements of the announcement are: Java EE technologies contributed by Oracle will be used to create the new Jakarta EE platform, including a fresh new logo selected by the community. The Eclipse Foundation is the new home of Cloud Native Java Jakarta EE Working Group[link to charter] priorities for modernizing the technology and its governance processes to be more open and community-based Results of inaugural Jakarta EE developer survey.
